description: Detects Service Principal Name Enumeration used for Kerberoasting Author: Markus Neis, keepwatch. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Possible SPN Enumeration
query: ((process.executable:*\\setspn.exe OR (winlog.event_data.Description:*Query\ or\ reset\ the\ computer* AND winlog.event_data.Description:*SPN\ attribute*)) AND process.command_line:*\-q*)
